clinical_study.brief_title: Automatic vs. Manual Optic Disc Planimetry
clinical_study.official_title: Automatic vs. Manual Optic Cup and Optic Disc Segmentation in Glaucoma

brief_summary.textblock: Manually and automatically by mashing learning algorithm optic disc will be evaluated (planimetry).

detailed_description.textblock: Cross-Over non-randomized Case-Series. Arm 1 (Manual segmentation): Manually marking of the boundaries of the optic disc and it's excavation on color photographs of the optic disc. Arm 2 (Automated segmentation): Automatic detection of the boundaries of the optic disc and it's excavation. Calculation of cup size, size of excavation, cup-to-disc ratio, and rim area. Comparison of all parameters of both arms and computing of agreement.
